Meta.title: Secure Multisize
Meta.author: zwa73
Meta.description:
此mod将使友方大型生物无法破坏帐篷内空间或是你的领土 同时提供了一个BepInEx配置 (如"SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.securemultisize.cfg") 允许你设置: 允许大型生物破坏城市 约束任何大型生物
注意: 大型生物还是有可能会堵住你的道路, 所以请准备好传送法杖或类似的东西
This mod prevents friendly large creatures from destroying tent interiors or your territory. It also provides a BepInEx configuration (e.g., SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Elin\BepInEx\config\sosarciel.securemultisize.cfg). that allows you to set: Allows large creatures to destroy cities Restricts any large creatures
Note: Large creatures may still block your paths, so be prepared with a teleport staff or similar items.
